Name: Container.Table
Desc: Dynamic data table with sorting, filtering, and pagination.
LongDesc: The Container.Table method creates a feature-rich data table supporting sorting, searching, filtering, pagination, and row selection. It is highly customizable and suitable for displaying tabular data interactively.
Example:
var table = Q.Container().Table([{ name: 'Alice', age: 30 }, { name: 'Bob', age: 25 }]);
document.body.appendChild(table);
